import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List all teams"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/all"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all teams without pagination. Use this when you need a complete team catalog for selection or synchronization jobs.

**Prerequisites**
- None. Authentication scopes which teams appear.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/teams/all](/docs/api/teams/list-all-teams) to load the full list.
2. Use `Items[].TeamId` to fetch details or manage membership.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
